title: Educational Documentation System with Explosive Recursive Decomposition
description: Design and implement a comprehensive wiki-based documentation system that uses explosive recursive decomposition to break down complex software engineering concepts into progressively detailed explanations. The system supports just-in-time learning with inline clarifications and maintains professional tone suitable for all education levels from middle school through graduate research.

objectives: Design information architecture using explosive recursive decomposition principles
Create documentation patterns that support diverse learning styles and skill levels
Implement just-in-time learning system with contextual cross-references
Establish quality standards for pedagogical technical writing
Design automated documentation consistency and coverage validation
prerequisites: Familiarity with wiki systems and markdown

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Documentation structure follows explosive recursive decomposition pattern
acceptance_criteria.test_method: Automated hierarchy analysis and depth validation

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Content accessible to middle school through graduate level readers
All code concepts have corresponding wiki explanations
acceptance_criteria.test_method: Automated cross-reference validation between code and wiki

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Just-in-time learning links provide appropriate cognitive scaffolding
acceptance_criteria.test_method: Educational expert review and user testing

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Professional tone maintained throughout all content
acceptance_criteria.test_method: Style guide compliance checking and tone analysis

definition_of_done: Complete wiki structure implemented with recursive decomposition
All major concepts covered with progressive detail levels
Cross-reference system functional between code and documentation
Readability analysis shows appropriate levels for target audiences
Style guide established and enforced through automation
Documentation update workflows integrated with development process
User testing validates learning effectiveness across skill levels

unit_test_question.question: In explosive recursive decomposition for documentation, what is the primary goal when breaking down a complex concept like 'Clean Architecture'?
options: Create as many sub-pages as possible for comprehensive coverage
Make each level accessible while providing pathways to deeper understanding
Ensure all readers must read all levels to understand the concept
Focus only on the most advanced aspects since beginners can Google basics
unit_test_question.correct_answer: Make each level accessible while providing pathways to deeper understanding
unit_test_question.explanation: Explosive recursive decomposition aims to serve readers at their current level while offering clear pathways to explore deeper. Each level should be self-contained but enriched by optional deeper exploration.

competency_indicators.description: Can follow existing documentation patterns to create simple explanations
Understands how to break complex topics into logical sub-components
Can design documentation hierarchies that serve multiple skill levels
Can create comprehensive documentation systems with effective cross-referencing
Can design documentation patterns that optimize cognitive load and learning efficiency
Can create innovative documentation systems that advance the field of technical communication

educational_metadata.industry_relevance: Strong technical documentation skills are highly valued in the Pacific Northwest tech sector. Companies like Microsoft, Amazon, and Google heavily emphasize clear technical communication.
common_pitfalls: Creating documentation that's too shallow or too deep
Ignoring cognitive load in information presentation
Failing to maintain documentation consistency over time
extension_activities: Design documentation systems for different technical domains
Create automated documentation generation from code
Implement user analytics for documentation effectiveness

mentoring.mentor_notes: This epic combines technical writing skills with educational design principles. Students often underestimate the complexity of writing for diverse audiences - emphasize user empathy and iterative improvement.
check_in_questions: How do you balance comprehensive coverage with cognitive load management?
Can you explain why we need different levels of detail for the same concept?
success_indicators: Student considers reader cognitive load in all documentation decisions
Student creates clear information hierarchies that serve multiple audiences
Student proactively seeks feedback from different user types
intervention_triggers: Student writes only for their own skill level
Student creates either too shallow or overwhelmingly detailed content
Student struggles to organize information logically
